    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sound and water waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton- und Wasserwellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ondes de sonore et d'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas do som e da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde dell'acqua e del suono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύματα ήχου και ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas del sonido y del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares the movement of sound waves travelling through the air (top) and water waves travelling across the water (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">longitudinal waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">loudspeakers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transverse waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht die Bewegung der 
Schallwellen, die durch die Luft (Oberseite) fortpflanzen und Wasser 
bewegt das Reisen über das Wasser wellenartig (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare le mouvement des vagues 
saines voyageant par l'air (dessus) et l'eau ondule le déplacement à
travers l'eau (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara o movimento das ondas 
sadias que viajam através do ar (alto) e a água acena viajar 
através da água (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema confronta il movimento delle onde 
sonore che attraversano through l'aria (parte superiore) e l'acqua 
fluttua viaggiare attraverso l'acqua (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει τη μετακίνηση των υγιών 
κυμάτων που ταξιδεύουν μέσω των κυμάτων αέρα (κορυφή) και 
ύδατος που μετακινούνται από την μιά άκρη στην άλλη του ύδατος 
(κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara el movimiento de las ondas 
acústicas que viajan a través del aire (tapa) y el agua agita viajar
a través del agua (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
